name: Super Bacon Adventure the Third 2 Two Remastered
name_original: Super Bacon Adventure the Third 2 Two Remastered
description:
Top down shooter featuring cowboys and a super cool wild west theme. Currently there are 7 different guns to use from the classic revolver to the powerful gattling gun. Find a varity of items scattered around the levels to power you up in different ways. Still in early development so feedback is appreciated. Made in gamemaker.

Controls-

WASD to move,

click to shoot,

right click to manually reload (certain guns only),

Middle click to throw a grenade,

R to restart the game
